fields.fieldDescription: "If outstanding is a match-funded loan, indicates the Record ID (RID) of the record of match-funded cost of funds rates.  (One match-funded cost of funds rate will exist in this record for every host bank portfolio loan share)."
The Record ID (RID) of the outstanding.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
"The code identifying the type of owner (Loan, SBLC,etc.)."
"If outstanding is an SBLC, indicates whether the associated SBLC fees are paid in advance (or in arrears)."
Indicates whether or not the rate applied to this outstanding is expressed as a flat amount.
Indicates whether or not the rate applied to this outstanding is calculated as an average rate.
Difference between all-in rate and cost of funds
Indicates whether cost of funds is automatically assigned by a client API rather than manually assigned by Treasury via Loan IQ
"If outstanding is an SBLC, indicates the minimum amount of the associated issuance rate fee or facing fee."
The rate applied to this outstanding, expressed as a percentage.  (If outstanding is a loan, indicates the borrower base rate; if an SBLC, indicates the rate for the issuance fee or the facing fee).
This column is obsolete.  MatchFunded COF rate is stored on VLS_OST_TR_COF_SHR.OTC_PCT_RATE
"If outstanding is a loan, indicates the spread to be added to the borrower base rate, expressed as a percentage."
"The code for the rate basis.  (If outstanding is a loan, indicates the rate basis of the borrower base rate; if an SBLC, indicates the rate basis of the associated issuance rate fee or facing fee)."
"Float start date.  (If outstanding is a loan, indicates the float start date for the borrower base rate; if an SBLC, indicates the float start date for the issuance rate)."
"If outstanding is a loan, indicates the float start date for the spread to be added to the borrower base rate."
"If outstanding is a match-funded loan, indicates the rate basis for the host bank match-funded cost of funds rate."
"If outstanding is an SBLC, indicates the type of associated SBLC fee.  If both an issuance rate fee and a facing fee exist, two Outstanding Rates records will exist."
The new percentage field to store the Reserve Asset Cost rate for loans.
support override rounding precision for BA and Discount Loan price (Ticket:29830)
The borrower's effective rate for the outstanding
The net present value of the margin (i.e, difference between all-in rate and cost of funds)
the base rate with which the Swap Receive Fee is calculated for any swap shares on the Reference Asset loan
use user entered spread on the loan after release instead of overriding with spread from pricing.
